text: (ibrahima a.Sa.E) kahyum, ke tame je murti'oni puja allaha sivaya kari che, tame loko'e temane duniyana phayadana karane mitra banavya, tame sau kayamatana divase ekabijano inkara karava lagaso ane ekabija para phitakara karava lagaso ane tamara saunum thekanum jahannama hase ane tamari madada karanara ko'i nahim hoya
